description: Collect LinkedIn Sales Navigator search results

outputDescription.name: Full name of the person
outputDescription.title: Title of the job
outputDescription.degree: Your degree of Connection with that profile
outputDescription.query: Corresponding search query that lead to this result
outputDescription.defaultProfileUrl: Regular LinkedIn profile URL - if converting each profile link

helpers: Enter either a text search OR a Google Spreadsheet URL OR a CSV URL
When using a spreadsheet/CSV URL, make sure your file is publicly available
OR make an advanced search on Sales Navigator and paste the URL you're sent to here
searches.label: LinkedIn search terms (?)

numberOfProfiles.label: Number of profiles to scrape (?)
numberOfProfiles.helper: <b>LinkedIn limits search results to the first 1 000 profiles.

columnName.label: Column name from which to search terms or URLs
columnName.helper: By default, we'll use the first column of your spreadsheet (column A)

numberOfLinesPerLaunch.label: Number of lines of your spreadsheet to process per launch (?)
numberOfLinesPerLaunch.helper: If using a spreadsheet. All of them if empty

extractDefaultUrl.rightLabel: Extract default LinkedIn profiles URLs - takes longer, also visits each profile - Do not use if you have hundreds of results!
